About me

Software Developer

I am a graduate student from State University of New York at Buffalo. Currently persuing Masters in Computer Science and Engineering, I completed my undergrad in Electronics and Telecommunication and worked in an IoT startup for 1.5 years. My interests lie in Systems Design and Development.
